elements.name: header
elements.html:
Code.org AI 101 Self-paced Online Professional Learning for Educators

Welcome to the program!

Code.org relies on surveys as a crucial tool through which we remain connected to teachers, and to give you the opportunity to provide feedback about our curriculum and your teaching experience, as well as to improve our programs.

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share anonymous, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your anonymized responses will be used by Code.org and our Regional Partners for program improvement.

Your honesty and candor are appreciated.

AI 101 For Educators: Pre-Module Survey

elements.name: main_goal
elements.title: What is your main goal for this professional learning?

choices.text: Learn the basics of using Artificial Intelligence as an educator
Learn best strategies for teaching  for teaching with and/or about Artificial Intelligence

elements.name: main_goal_other
elements.title: Please describe your main goal for this professional learning

elements.name: plan_use_ai_educator
elements.title: Do you plan to use Artificial Intelligence (AI) in your role as an educator?
elements.minRateDescription: I don't plan to use AI
elements.maxRateDescription: I definitely plan to use AI

elements.name: interest_learn_ai
elements.title: How interested are you in learning about Artificial Intelligence (AI)?

elements.name: use_ai_school_classroom
elements.title: How interested are you in using Artificial Intelligence (AI) in your school or classroom; either with students or to support your role as a teacher/administrator?

elements.name: perception_students_need_learn_ai
elements.title: How necessary do you think it is for students to learn about Artificial Intelligence (AI)?

elements.name: familiarity_ai
elements.title: Which best describes your current level of familiarity with Artificial Intelligence (AI)?

choices.text: I have used AI a few times
I have attended professional development around using AI
I regularly use AI in my role as an educator

elements.name: teacher_role
elements.title: Which best describes you in your role as an educator?

choices.text: Out-of-school educator (e.g. tutor, after school teacher)

elements.name: race_eth
elements.title: Which of the following best represents your racial or ethnic background? Please select all that apply. (optional)

choices.text: Racial or ethnic background not listed
